Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Listen up guys! Here's the lowdown: people have been left stranded at sea but luckily a major rescue operation managed to save 11 fishermen who were starving and dehydrated. On another note there's a huge debate brewing over whether central banks are doing too much to keep interest rates low with fears of dangerous economic bubbles. Meanwhile Aussies are calling for a boost to JobSeeker payments as financial woes continue due to the pandemic. It's been a wild ride in the financial world but plenty more news expected to come our way soon.
